comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
We will run binskim during the official build which will tell us.
https://github.com/Microsoft/binskim

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
We don't build `pwsh.exe`, so is the executable also has this option set on?
According to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj835761.aspx, if not, powershell may not be able to benefit from this option.

**This is not a blocking comment.**

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I see the option in CoreCLR https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=HIGHENTROPYVA&type=

title: Add HighEntropyVA to building pwsh
